authors: Department of Pediatrics, Section of Neurology, School of Medicine, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, Aurora, CO.
Department of Pediatrics, Section of Neurology, School of Medicine, University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus, Aurora, CO.
text: Researchers from the Children's National Health System in Washington, D.C. studied the feasibility, rate of complications, and effect on seizures of initiating the Ketogenic Diet (KD) in pediatric patients with Super-Refractory Status Epilepticus (SRSE).
title: Ketogenic Diet in Super-Refractory Status Epilepticus.
